about.Impression: Ideal Hotel: What You Need to Know
about.impTxt: This hotel is located in a quiet area of Samarkand, just a 5-minute walk from University Boulevard and a 10-minute walk from the historic Registan Square. The elegant Ideal Hotel offers free Wi-Fi for guests. The rooms at Ideal Hotel are decorated in a classic style and furnished with stylish wooden furniture. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator, and a terrace. Every morning, breakfast is served for guests. Across the street, at the Ideal Restaurant, you can enjoy Uzbek and European cuisine for lunch and dinner. In the summer, drinks and fruits are served near the fountain. The front desk at Ideal Hotel is open 24/7. There is also a tour desk available for guests. Transfer services to Samarkand Train Station and Airport are provided. Central Park is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. The Church of St. John and the Alexeyevsky Cathedral are just a 5-minute walk away from Ideal Hotel.
